EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Information (1319748237.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1319748237.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lisa,
Great to hear! I’m glad you were able to negotiate a higher rate with them J. The next steps would be for me to reach out directly to your contact, so I will send Marva an email tomorrow with a copy of our Master Service Agreement to see if they are willing to use that, if not they may counter with their own agreement that I will review.
Once we get the contract process started I will send you an email with the link to enroll in our system (not a huge rush to complete this as we would not activate you for at least a month and a half) and I will give you further instructions at that time on how to complete the enrollment.
If you have any additional questions for me I would be happy to set up another time for us to speak, but the information you provided me will be enough to get started with HPH.
I look forward to working with you!
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Lisa Pritchard [mailto:pritchard.lisa@rocketmail.com] Sent: Thursday, October 27, 2011 3:43 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information
Hi Nicolette,
Thanks for all of your help and information. Here is what I was able to work out with Hawaii Pacific Health:
1. 1099 hourly rate will be $58 2. They will continue the weekly invoicing frequency, Net 30 3. They will be cutting checks
Do you need to speak to HPH first, or do we need to talk again to set things up?
Here is the contact person at HPH (my supervisor)
Marva Chun Director, PMO
work 808-535-7180 cell 808-228-1481 e-mail marvac@kapiolani.org
Thanks, Lisa
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Tuesday, October 25, 2011 9:42 AM To: Lisa Pritchard Subject: MBO Information
Hi Lisa,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today! Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. I’ve included a few items as promised regarding the MBO Program:
Link to our true group benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf · Link to our Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf
Link to a video about How We Help Independent Consultants:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1
Using MBO Partners versus working on a 1099 basis:http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf
Also, below are a few articles just for you to read at your leisure:
http://www.channelinsider.com/c/a/Spotlight/Top-Mistakes-New-IT-Consultants-Make-And-How-to-Avoid-Making-Them-Yourself-180466/
http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/Landmark-National-Study-Reveals-Millions-Join-New-Age-Career-Independence-Surprising-1557357.htm
If you have any additional questions for me feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you again soon!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
